attributes.action: dissolve government and hold an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the obvious and widespread abuse of the expenses available to Members of Parliament, I believe that the public have lost all faith in their elected officials.  The Prime Minister is therefore urged to immediately dissolve parliamnent and hold a general election which will enable the people of Great Britain to express their views on this scandal at the polls.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
